activities: We are a health information and risk management technology company that stores personal information for crew members and passengers traveling across the world.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client information regarding passengers and crew members. The data is manually entered by the customers users and secured/safeguarded by our organization.
privacyprograms: Our organization has previously certified products under the Office of the National Coordinator for Health Information Technology (ONC). We also abide to various levels of HIPAA compliance and personal information security.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
